comment: Minum air putih yang banyak terus istirahat pio
amr:
# ::snt Minum air putih yang banyak terus istirahat pio
(s / string-entity
      :value "Minum"
      :mod (a / air)
      :ARG1-of (p / putih
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 s
                  :ARG3 (m / more)))
      :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01
            :value "banyak"
            :ARG1 s)
      :ARG2-of m2
      :ARG2 s
      :value "istirahat")

comment: Udah mam belummm? minum air putih yg banyak ci, trs istirahat. Smg cpt baikan yaahh~
amr:
# ::snt Udah mam belummm? minum air putih yg banyak ci, trs istirahat. Smg cpt baikan yaahh~
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (u / udah
                  :mode expressive)
            :op2 (b / belummm
                  :mode expressive)
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (p / put-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 y
                  :ARG2 (a4 / air))
            :op2 (p2 / put-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (b2 / banyak
                              :mode expressive)
                        :op2 (t / trs
                              :mode expressive))
                  :ARG2 a4)
            :op3 (p3 / put-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG1 (a6 / and
                        :op1 (s / string-entity
                              :value "banyak")
                        :op2 (s2 / string-entity
                              :value "tirahat"))))
      :snt3 (a7 / and
            :op1 (s3 / string-entity
                  :value "smg")
            :op2 (s4 / string-entity
                  :value " baikan"))
      :op4 (s5 / string-entity
            :value "yaahh"))
